name: Pumpkin Jack and the Witch's Curse
name_original: Pumpkin Jack and the Witch's Curse
description:
The witch has stolen your soul and placed it in three unholy candles! Make your way to the end of the stage to retrieve a candle, but then hurry back to the pumpkin patch at the start of the level, because the witch will chase you when you pick up the candle!

The 'A' button jumps (and in the last level, fires candy projectiles)

This is a short platforming game I wanted to get done by Halloween. I may revisit it to try and fix some things that I had to give up in order to get it released in time for the holiday. 

All graphics were done by myself.
The music is 'Short Hauntings' by Ember#1765 / DeerTears and 'Detective Intro' by krümel (crumb)#0723
Made in GBStudio
